label: Princess Prep Office 6
description:
John examines the filing cabinet.  
He notices Princess Karin's file folder sitting on top of the other folders, but there's nothing inside.
As he goes through the rest of the cabinet, he sees two files that were pulled up but apparently not looked through.
The name Violet Moonshadow is one one, and Scarlet "Red" Clover is on the other, John decides to take them.

Hit 1 for John to continue to the desk.
Hit 2 for John to check out the plants.

Hit 0 to quit.
